title: Love Temple
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Indian, Italian, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar
description: A 100% vegetarian/vegan restaurant located right on the beach by the life guard station and the drum circle. Professional chefs prepare made-in-house menu items and will also cook something for you not on the menu, upon request, and does it with love. In addition, there are 3 group rooms, 25 cottages, an auditorium, a performance stage, dance space, and a spa center.
streetAddress: Near Life Guard Station, Arambol Beach
